titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the excise tax on net investment income of certain private colleges and universities.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the excise tax on net investment income of certain private colleges and universities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill increases the excise tax (from 1.4% to 35%) on the net investment income of private educational institutions whose assets had a aggregate fair market value of at least $10 billion in the preceding taxable year.
